title: 2006–07 in Cypriot football
text:
First Division.
The <a href="Cypriot%20First%20Division%202006-07">first division</a> winners were <a href="APOEL%20F.C.">APOEL</a>.
Cypriot Cup.
The <a href="Cypriot%20Cup%202006-07">cup</a> winners were <a href="Anorthosis%20Famagusta%20FC">Anorthosis Famagusta FC</a>.
Cyprus FA Shield.
The <a href="Cyprus%20FA%20Shield">Cyprus FA Shield</a> winners were <a href="Anorthosis%20Famagusta%20FC">Anorthosis Famagusta FC</a>.
Second Division.
The <a href="2006%E2%80%9307%20Cypriot%20Second%20Division">second division</a> winners were <a href="APOP%20Kinyras%20FC">APOP Kinyras</a>.
Third Division.
The <a href="2006%E2%80%9307%20Cypriot%20Third%20Division">third division</a> winners were <a href="Ermis%20Aradippou">Ermis Aradippou</a>.
